titleStmt.title: Nevil Payn's letter, and some other letters that concern the subject of his letter With short notes on them; for the clearer informaton of the members of Parliament: in order to Nevil Payn's tryal. Licens'd, July I, 1693. Edw. Cooke.
titleStmt.author: Payne, Henry Neville, fl. 1672-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Edinburgh, by Order of Parliament: and reprinted at London for Richard Baldwin, near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
